info.title: Navigate to an item in a menu by typing a character

references.linkText: APG Example: Actions Menu Button  Using aria-activedescendant

raw.name: VoiceOver for macOS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: If VoiceOver said 'quick nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'quick nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav off', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav on', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back off.

setupScript.scriptDescription: opens the menu, and sets focus on 'Action 1'
setupScript.name: openMenuAndSetFocusToFirstItem

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'Action 1' menu item, type a character to navigate to a different menu item.

quickNavOff: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
If VoiceOver said 'quick nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.

assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the focused item, 'Action 2', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey name of the focused item, 'Action 2'

assertions.assertionStatement: Role of the focused item, 'menu item', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey role of the focused item, 'menu item'

assertions.assertionStatement: Position of the focused item in the menu, '2', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey position of the focused item in the menu, '2'

assertions.assertionStatement: Number of items in the menu,'(4', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey number of items in the menu, '4'
